definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Physical testing and chemical analysis and electropolishing test were made to study the reasons of occurring of surface veins.
sentences.chinese: 对灯罩表面水纹状进行了理化检验和电解抛光试验。

sentences.english: This pool can also be used for experimentations on hydro-culture or cultivating plants for biofuel.
sentences.chinese: 该池也可用于水纹研究实验或栽培水生植物生物燃料。

sentences.english: Can you search the distinctive runing waterdropmarks of the stamp?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到这枚邮票上有明显的水纹吗？

sentences.english: Can you find the distinctive watermarks of this stamp?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到这枚邮票上有明显的水纹吗？

sentences.english: Can you search the distinctive runing watermarks of the stamp?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到这枚邮票上有明显的水纹吗？

sentences.english: If you gaze at these ripples for a while.
sentences.chinese: 你要是一直盯着这些水纹。

definition: gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
five (main) colors (white, black, red, yellow, and blue)/multicolored
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
water screen (screen formed of sprayed water droplets, used for displaying projected images, for temperature control, or for air purification)
